name: Junk Jester - The Supervillian Metroidvania
description:
Join the evil Junk Jester on his perilous quest to escape prison!

Junk Jester is a submission for Metroidvania Month 19. This is a superhero themed rhomp you won't want to miss!

Features include:

  • 17 individual rooms
  • 1 weapon and 2 abilities to find and unlock
  • A unique comic book art style
  • Beat-Em-Up combat

*NOTE: We will be using the 72 bug fix period to make a few fixes for the game. If you are having trouble playing it, come back later!
